posts.name: Trevor Biller
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.58.0-beta.1. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

  • A new section in the message reaction selector automatically displays all of the emoji reactions that a message has received. Now you can quickly jump on the bandwagon and add a standard sparkling heart just like everyone else already did, or you can follow your own heart and go with the anatomical heart instead.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.57.0-beta.1…v7.58.0-beta.1 · signalapp/Signal-Desktop · GitHub

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Desktop 7.57 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.58.0-beta.1

61 new commits since 7.57.0-beta.2:

Show commits

  • v7.58.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Simplify message receiver event [2]

  • Add a new CLI flag [3]

  • Be more lenient with profile change export [4]

  • Allow exporting pni-only contacts [5]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.52.2 [6]

  • Propagate CLI option to Settings UI [7]

  • Be more lenient to misplaced pni in conversations [8]

  • Normalize message attachments [9]

  • Update size of audio playback button [10]

  • Update minimum ubuntu version [11]

  • Ensure consistency in forwarding logic [12]

  • Drop pni call messages [13]

  • Fix localization of "New call" view header [14]

  • Don't show reactions from call participants who have recently left [15]

  • Show error toast on database errors [16]

  • onUnregistered: Split contact even if we don't have pni [17]

  • Release notes for 7.57 [18]

  • Update strings [19]

  • Update DNS fallback [20]

  • Bump electron from 36.2.1 to 36.3.2 [21]

  • Improve Error Handling from LibSignal's WebSocket Opens [22]

  • Centralize notification logic [23]

  • Fix main window not showing on Linux with Wayland [24]

  • Move Profile Editor into the new Settings Tab [25]

  • [signalapp/Signal-Desktop#7345] Update primary device description [26]

  • Enable libsignal TLS 1.3 enforcement via config [27]

  • Always use the websocket for chat requests [28]

  • Add message schema version section to internal settings [29]

  • Migration to normalize all attachments [30]

  • Remove Release Notes Feature Flag [31]

  • Fix scrollbar border colors and positioning [32]

  • Settings Tab: When settings change, make proper updates [33]

  • Update windows image used for github actions runs [34]

  • Settings Tab: Allow resizing the left pane [35]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.53.0 [36]

  • Better state teardown in tests [37]

  • Show bottom-left profile photo in nightly builds and in development [38]

  • Unify shared group computation logic [39]

  • Fix button label for save dialog [40]

  • Add settings for local backups [41]

  • Start separating calls made to chat service [42]

  • Add "This Message" reactions [43]

  • Settings Tab: Better layout for narrow windows [44]

  • [signalapp/Signal-Desktop#7348] Prefer user's own reaction variant in ReactionViewer [45]

  • Strip filenames for visual media attachments during upload [46]

  • [signalapp/Signal-Desktop#7347] Update input padding for edit group modal [47]

  • Show error on invalid username links [48]

  • Fix focus UI for ListTile [49]

  • Settings Tab: Educate user about change to bottom-left profile icon [50]

  • Cleanup logging levels in WebAPI [51]

  • Replace buffer.slice() with buffer.subarray() [52]

  • Refactor build expiration checks [53]

  • When a profile fetch fails, warn and don't log callstack [54]

  • Settings Tab: Show updates dialog in all states but None [55]

  • Linkify untruncated text [56]

  • Release notes bug fixes, unit tests [57]

  • Don't go to settings after showing ProfileMovedModal [58]

  • Release notes for 7.58.x [59]

  • Update strings [60]

  • 7.58.0-beta.1 [61]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.57.0-beta.2…v7.58.0-beta.1

posts.name: Trevor Biller
posts.cooked: This beta includes a migration for our attachments layer – if you’re willing (and particularly if you have decent sized message history on Signal Beta), we’d love to see your debug logs to check on the migration and its performance. Thanks!

posts.name: Tiwo Satriatama
posts.cooked:
updates-bot:

Strip filenames for visual media attachments during upload

Finally. Thank you thank you thank you thank you

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked: My profile picture is gone and now I can only see it by going into settings :(

New Version: 7.58.0-beta.2

4 new commits since 7.58.0-beta.1:

  • Update message attachment migration [1]

  • Skip flaky release notes fetcher service test [2]

  • Update strings [3]

  • 7.58.0-beta.2 [4]
